title: Indonesia - Tourist/Visit Visa

details.title: Eligibility
items: Bangladeshi passport valid for at least 6 months from travel date
Sufficient proof of funds (minimum USD $2000 within the last 6 months)
Visa is only for tourism, business, official activities, conferences, humanitarian or journalistic reasons (no paid work allowed)
Special permit required for journalistic or film/video-making activities before visa application

details.title: Required Documents
items: Valid passport with at least 6 months validity
Two recent passport-size color photos (3x4 cm, white background)
Bank statement and solvency showing at least USD $2000
Confirmed return air ticket and hotel reservation
Health declaration letter and consent letter to pay medical expenses
Job Holders: NOC, office ID card, visiting card
Business Persons: Trade license with English translation and notary, company pad (2 copies), memorandum (if required), visiting card
Students: Student ID card, NOC from institution, father's documents if applying individually

note: All expenditures related to visa processing are strictly non-refundable. Visa information and associated charges are subject to change at any time without prior notice. We provide assistance only and do not guarantee the issuance of visas. This information sheet has been prepared by us and may include additional details beyond the embassy's requirements.
